member.name: T:BattleCore.Events.PlayerInfoEvent
member.summary: PlayerInfoEvent object. This event is used to retrieve player information from the core.

remarks.para: Usage: Implement this in a method to handle player info.
To request all player information from the core, create the PlayerInfoEvent object and send it to the core.
remarks.code: PlayerInfoEvent e = new PlayerInfoEvent (); SendGameEvent (e);
remarks.para: To request information about specific players, add the player names to the Players field before sending the event

member.name: P:BattleCore.Events.PlayerInfoEvent.Players
member.summary: Player names property used to request information about specific players.

member.name: P:BattleCore.Events.PlayerInfoEvent.PlayerList
member.summary: Player List Property containing all known information about requested players.

member.name: T:BattleCore.Events.SpectatePlayerEvent
member.summary: SpectatePlayerEvent object. This event is used to spectate a player in the arena.

remarks.para: Usage: Create and send this event to spectate a player.

member.name: T:BattleCore.Events.PlayerDeathEvent
member.summary: PlayerDeathEvent object. This event is triggered when a player is killed.

remarks.para: Usage: Implement this in a method to handle player death events.

member.name: T:BattleCore.Events.SqlCommandEvent
member.summary: SqlQueryEvent object. This event is used to execute a command on the configured database.

remarks.para: Usage: Implement this in a method to handle the command data.
To execute a command on the configured database, add the SQL command to the command field before sending the event

member.summary: SQL command property used to set the command.

member.summary: Send an event to the game server. This is the most commonly used method to send events.

member.summary: Send an event within the bot to all loaded behaviors

member.name: T:BattleCore.Events.ChatEvent
member.summary: ChatEvent object. This event is used to receive chat messages from the server, and send chat messages to the server.

remarks.para: Usage: Implement this in a method to handle chat events.
To send a chat mesage to the server, create the ChatEvent object
Then send it by calling:
remarks.code: SendGameEvent (e);

member.name: P:BattleCore.Events.ChatEvent.Message
member.summary: The Message Property represents the chat message
member.value: The Message property gets/sets the message string data member.

member.name: P:BattleCore.Events.ChatEvent.PlayerName
member.summary: The PlayerName Property represents the player name
member.value: The PlayerName property gets/sets the player name data member.

remarks.para: When sending a chat event to the server, this value may be used to identify the receiving player in a private chat message
